summary: This code is running the pyiqa_inference.py script with the specified image and name argument, which downloads the necessary weights from Torch Hub directory for image quality testing.

details.comment: This code is running the pyiqa_inference.py script with the specified image and name argument, which downloads the necessary weights from Torch Hub directory for image quality testing.
details.content:
python3 pyiqa_inference.py -n $1 -i sample.bmp
# it is downloading weights to torch hub directory.
